description: The service will launch in December with six return flights each week, between Sunday and Friday,
title: Loganair announces Isle of Man to Heathrow flights from December
title_page: Loganair announces Isle of Man to Heathrow flights from December - BBC News
maintext: Mr Baker said the route had been underwritten by the Manx government as air services were not "commercially viable" at this time due to the island's border restrictions.
